   1: 
   2: 
   3: module bsg_fifo_1r1w_fence
   4:  #(parameter width_p = "inv"
   5:    , parameter els_p = "inv"
   6: 
   7:    // Default parameters
   8:    , parameter ready_THEN_valid_p = 0
   9:    )
  10:   (input                  clk_i
  11:    , input                reset_i
  12: 
  13:    , input                fence_set_i
  14:    , input                fence_clr_i
  15:    , output               fence_o
  16: 
  17:    , input [width_p-1:0]  data_i
  18:    , input                v_i
  19:    , output               ready_o
  20: 
  21:    , output [width_p-1:0] data_o
  22:    , output               v_o
  23:    , input                yumi_i
  24:    );
  25: 
  26:   bsg_fifo_1r1w_small
  27:    #(.width_p(width_p)
  28:      ,.els_p(els_p)
  29:      ,.ready_THEN_valid_p(ready_THEN_valid_p)
  30:      )
  31:    fe_cmd_fifo
  32:     (.clk_i(clk_i)
  33:      ,.reset_i(reset_i)
  34: 
  35:      ,.data_i(data_i)
  36:      ,.v_i(v_i)
  37:      ,.ready_o(ready_o)
  38: 
  39:      ,.data_o(data_o)
  40:      ,.v_o(v_o)
  41:      ,.yumi_i(yumi_i)
  42:      );
  43: 
  44:   logic fence_r;
  45:   bsg_dff_reset_en
  46:    #(.width_p(1))
  47:    fence_reg
  48:     (.clk_i(clk_i)
  49:      ,.reset_i(reset_i)
  50:      ,.en_i(fence_set_i | fence_clr_i)
  51: 
  52:      ,.data_i(fence_set_i)
  53:      ,.data_o(fence_r)
  54:      );
  55: 
  56:   assign fence_o = fence_r;
  57: 
  58: endmodule
  59:
